title: Creativity House
description: Situational Questions in Professional Project Management

test.text:
A project manager is responsible for leading a product release that has aggressive go-to-market timelines. A total of 600 story points is estimated with a velocity of 60 points per iteration. A team of up to 2 members has been assigned to this project.
Which statement about this scenario is true?

choices.text: A velocity of 60 points per iteration represents the minimum work to be done, and 2 team members represent the maximum size of the team.
A velocity of 60 points per iteration means the project is under control, and 2 team members mean that the project is out of control.
A velocity of 60 points per iteration means the project is under control, and 2 team members represent the maximum size of the team.
A velocity of 60 points per iteration represents the minimum work to be done, and 2 team members means the project is under control.

test.text:
A project manager in a manufacturing company was notified of a failure of the delivered machinery during the initial tests. The machine failed to comply with standard design specifications, resulting in malfunctions and safety concerns.
What should the project manager do first to address the issue?

choices.text: Review the initial testing procedure and execution.
Assess the environmental and individual factors.
Evaluate the technical documentation of the machine.
Check the communications between the stakeholders.

test.text:
A project manager is leading a project to deliver a new product in a heavily regulated industry and must prioritize quality management practices. The project manager is considering the management of quality improvements.

Implement a strategy of frequent quality audits and product defect tracking to identify and address any quality issues.
Streamline quality and compliance practices by delegating responsibility for quality control to a designated team member.
Establish clear quality metrics and targets for each project stage to ensure compliance with regulatory quality standards.

test.text:

Use the contingency reserve to implement a fast-track activity.
Review the change control process and implement improvements.
Escalate the problem with the stakeholder to the project sponsor.

test.text:

Evaluated the cultural and personal traits in the various countries before issuing a general directive.
Determined the socioeconomic status of the team members before issuing a widespread directive.
Obtained a list of personal preferences from the team members before issuing a broad directive.

test.text:

Meet with the stakeholder to understand their needs and update the communication management plan.

testing while the project manager meets with the key stakeholder to review the proposed changes.
